subNodes.conversationText: root
|Miki|Father, are you okay?|***ga_destroy-->String::fx_containment_barrier    Int::0    Float::0    |
I think I am okay...I feel weak...Miki, is that really you?
Yes father, you're safe now.
How did you find me?
By accident, I guess...my friends here and I are trying to cross the Grimstan Mountains to the Eastern Lands.
Father, we thought you died fighting off Zorn's minions.
I thought I did too.
It's good to see you, Galdor.  You must be feeling weak, but may we ask you a few questions?
Yes, please, ask and I will try and answer what I can.
Do you know where you are and how you got here?
I'm not sure where I am...it has been such a long time...I'm not sure how long.
I was part of the last group to try and hold off Zorn's minions while the others escaped, including my wife Veloria.
There were too many of them and I was mortally wounded.  I was left to die...
Out of nowhere, the two vampires arrived and all of Zorn's creatures ran off in fear.
They revived me and kept me in a magic chamber.
That battle took place over 60 years ago.
Has it really been that long?
It has...may we ask you another question?
Yes, please, ask and I will try and answer what I can.
Why were the vampires keeping you here?
Being an elf, and one of the elders at that, they knew they could tap into my gift for long life and drain me to support themselves for a very long time.
Why wouldn't they just seek out fresh blood victims like other vampires?
These two kept somewhat to themselves...they didn't like to leave their home and are more comfortable around the dead than the living.
I was, I guess, the perfect solution for them to maintain the lifestyle they were most comfortable with.
May we ask you another question?
Yes, please, ask and I will try and answer what I can.
I don't have any more questions.
Thank you for saving me.
Can we help you get out of here?
No, I will be okay.  As long as the path is clear, I can make it to safety.
Father, you must allow us to take you to mother in Lorenwaite.
No child, I will travel alone.  You and your friends have a much more important task at hand.
Recently, the vampires had become aware of certain plans by Zorn's minions to re-establish the path through the Grimstan Mountains.
Whatever plans they have, they must be stopped.
We shall try our best.  Take care Galdor.
Take care and may Elos guide you...Miki, we shall meet again soon.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::600    Int::1    ***ga_destroy-->String::Galdor2    Int::0    Float::0    |
Thank you for saving me.  My name is Galdor.|***ga_destroy-->String::fx_containment_barrier    Int::0    Float::0    |
Galdor?  The father of Miki and Lisa and the husband of Veloria?
Yes, you know them?  Are they okay?
I do know them and they are doing well, Galdor.  You must be feeling weak, but may we ask you a few questions?
Yes, please, ask and I will try and answer what I can.
Do you know where you are and how you got here?
I'm not sure where I am...it has been such a long time...I'm not sure how long.
I was part of the last group to try and hold off Zorn's minions while the others escaped, including my wife Veloria.
There were too many of them and I was mortally wounded.  I was left to die...
Out of nowhere, the two vampires arrived and all of Zorn's creatures ran off in fear.
They revived me and kept me in a magic chamber.
That battle took place over 60 years ago.
Has it really been that long?
It has...may we ask you another question?
Yes, please, ask and I will try and answer what I can.
Why were the vampires keeping you here?
Being an elf, and one of the elders at that, they knew they could tap into my gift for long life and drain me to support themselves for a very long time.
Why wouldn't they just seek out fresh blood victims like other vampires?
These two kept somewhat to themselves...they didn't like to leave their home and are more comfortable around the dead than the living.
I was, I guess, the perfect solution for them to maintain the lifestyle they were most comfortable with.
May we ask you another question?
Yes, please, ask and I will try and answer what I can.
I don't have any more questions.
Thank you for saving me.
Can we help you get out of here?
No, I will be okay.  As long as the path is clear, I can make it to safety.
Are you sure you do not want us to take you back to Lorenwaite?
No, I will travel alone.  You and your friends have a much more important task at hand.
Recently, the vampires had become aware of certain plans by Zorn's minions to re-establish the path through the Grimstan Mountains.
Whatever plans they have, they must be stopped.
We shall try our best.  Take care Galdor.
Take care and may Elos guide you.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::600    Int::1    ***ga_destroy-->String::Galdor2    Int::0    Float::0    |
